import React from "react"; import '../assets/styles/Project.scss'; function Project() { return(

Selected Projects

Real‑Time Weapon Detection — YOLOv11 vs RT‑DETR

Benchmarked YOLOv11 (CNN) against RT‑DETR (transformer) on CCTV streams with AMP training. RT‑DETR achieved mAP50 83.0 / mAP50–95 37.2 / Recall 76.2 vs YOLOv11 77.8 / 34.9 / 73.6, with latency 3.1ms vs 18.7ms. Shipped a Streamlit evaluation toolkit with PR curves and class‑wise mAP; exported .pt / ONNX / TorchScript.

{/* Optional: add links when repos/demos are public
Code Demo
*/}

Legal Judgment Prediction (LexGLUE — ECtHR Task B)

Built a long‑document multi‑label classifier with Legal‑BERT using overlap‑chunking + [SEP]. Fine‑tuned with AMP, AdamW, cosine LR + warmup, grad‑accum ×4, and focal loss. Achieved F1 0.741 (val 0.747) and Micro‑Acc 0.923 (≈ +2.9 F1 over BERT‑base). Added attention heatmaps for review; showed segmentation and adaptive thresholds were pivotal.

CityLearn — Multi‑Agent Energy Control

Designed a forecast‑aware controller for 18 buildings (8,760 steps) with a 173‑D state and 6‑step GRU forecasts, optimizing a unified cost/CO₂/peak/comfort objective. Benchmarked DQN, PPO, and SAC; tuned DQN reached district reward −13,580 (~90% over RBC) with +15.5% uplift from forecasts; 10‑seed validation (paired t‑test α = 0.05).

); } export default Project;
